name: Embed Anything
tag_list: embed, image, article, text, photo, content, publisher, copyright, citation, copy, paste, ad, advertisement, blog, newspaper, magazine, wordpress, attribution
overview:
EMBED ANYTHING offers free embedding technologies for digital publishers of any kind or size to use on their websites, giving their readers an alternative to copying their content and pasting it onto their own website or blog. Integration takes just minutes to do by dropping a small piece of code into your template, or installing one of Embed Anything’s WordPress Plugins.

– Embed ARTICLE Technology – People who copy content from an Embed Article enabled website are presented with a light-box offering a unique code snippet as an alternative to their copied text. This unique code snippet, when pasted into their website’s HTML, will render out the portion of the article they copied, a link back to the article source and an ad space.

 Features:

+) Gives others the ability to embed a portion (eg: first 200 words) of your articles onto their website or blog +) All embedded articles are rendered out using Java Script so that they are invisible to search engines, rather than competing for traffic +) Every embedded article will contain an ad space that you can use to monetize it on the embedding websites, or as a promotional tool for your own website +) Your article gets a link back to increase both traffic to your website & your article’s SEO value +) You’ll have access to reporting and be able to track where your articles are appearing across the web +) You’ll have the ability to remove unwanted article embeds with just a click

– Embed IMAGE Technology – It’s now simpler for someone to embed an image than it is to take it without permission. Any website enabled with Embed Image technology will have a button appear in the corner of their image whenever it’s moused over it. This gets the user’s attention right before they intend to copy it, take the image source, or save it, for the purpose of republishing it on their own website. Clicking the Embed Image button will produce a light-box containing a unique code snippet which, when pasted into the HTML of the embedding website, will render out the image along with a link back and an overlay ad space.

 Features:

+) Your images will be embeddable with just a click, offering a simpler and approved alternative +) Every embedded image contains an ad space that you can use to monetize it on the embedding website, or as a promotional/traffic driving tool for your website. +) Embedded Images will contain a link back to your website - building SEO and generating traffic +) Embedded images will be clickable pointing back to your website to drive traffic +) You’ll have access to reporting and be able to track where your images are appearing across the web +) You’ll have the ability to remove unwanted image embeds with just a click

Embed Anything technologies give any size publisher a better opportunity to standardize, monetize and optimize how their content is used across the web.

milestones.description:
Launched Embed Image Technology

"We make it easier for people to embed an image than to steal it"
